Articles.Content: Can't wait to send my Kerbals to their doom in these beautiful new rockets we can create! Absolutely love the part painter! And the modular wings are a thing of dreams! Very excited to get my hands on it!

Colonies will be an interesting feature to play with, I'm excited to manage colonies and supplying them and orbiting, and in the future, being able to manage them with friends in MP.

Of course, better physics will also be greatly appreciated,  hopefully the deep space kraken will be gone for the most part.
I am excited to see colonies and new ways to collect science!
Interstellar travel! It’s something that I think the first game lacked, because it opens up so many possibilities

I am excited to crash my ship into a planetary ring!

But mainly I am excited to go to another star.

Edited February 22, 2023 by cubinator

Hi everyone! I’m super excited for Kerbal Space Program 2 Early Access! I think I'm post excited about the new science system, exploring with friends and PAINTING MY ROCKET I love how this game makes learning rocket science fun and challenging. Thank you for this opportunity and good luck to everyone!
Excited for the colonies and multiplayer. cant wait for this game

Can't wait for everything lol!

Imagine creating a colony in multiplayer... Mamma mia!
Im excited to see how the game develops! will be neat to have colonies and interstellar travel in stock.
I am excited to see this game grow and evolve from the very beginning.
I look forward to see what happens when Jeb skydives deep into Jool's atmosphere.
I’m most excited for the new UI. The old one was very hard to find some things but now you can see it all in one spot. I’m also excited for interstellar travel.

I am the most exited for colonies and more exotic nuclear fission/fusion drives!

Edited February 22, 2023 by GaussFlux
wording

I'm excited for interstellar, space travel really inspires me!

A possible random number generator for selecting winners for free ksp2?: https://qrng.anu.edu.au/

Edited February 22, 2023 by Ryaja

I am excited to build on a larger scale than ever before with new procedural parts and be able to go longer distances (not just in the stock game and its implementation of interstellar travel, but also relating to the greatly increased modding capability of KSP2.)

Edited February 22, 2023 by Kekkie
I am most excited for the new VAB / SPH editor handling.
more ways to mass produce spaghetti!
I'm excited to see what modders will do with KSP 2.

I'm most excited for the interstellar space travel as I think that's going to be a big game changer and technology upgrade. Multiplayer is also something that's really going to be great and it'll be awesome to work together with friends to overcome various challenges and to set goals. The graphics overhaul and the easier tutorials will be great to see as well. I believe that modding capabilities will also be through the roof with the new technology and we'll see some cool mods over the years.

Edited February 22, 2023 by hunteriwnl
I just want to build interstellar colonies

I eagerly await to see the creative technical solutions the dev team found for the game. I'm excited about exploration and the exotic beauty of the celestial bodies. And I'm hopeful that multiplayer will have a persistent universe ever we can all build and play together.
Looking forward to all the new engine types and colonies can't wait for the release
Excited for procedural wings and the new paint options.
I'm excited to find out all the anomalies and references you guys put in this game.
The amazing Grapics and just enjoying the game again.
